DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 4 , single-center , open-label , interventional study , wherein enrol subject test Thyroid Stimulating Hormone ( TSH ) use quantitative qualitative Point-of-Care ( POC ) TSH test kit third generation TSH test kit time .
DOC.brief_title: Study Verify Clinical Utility Point-of-Care ( POC ) Thyroid Stimulating Hormone ( TSH ) Test Kits Compared Third Generation TSH Test Kit
DOC.criteria: Suspected hypothyroidism subject Willing comply trial protocol Signed informed consent document Menstrual period , bleed hemorrhoid , hematuria Drinking take aspirin within 48 hour Subjects partially completely restricted consciousness behavioral ability , independent decisionmaking ability .
